column5: Can you bring tomato's across border? thanks sidewinder

We've never had a question or raised eyebrow when bringing tomatoes thru Fr. Francis or Rainy River crossings. As long as they are for your own consumption, I doubt that you will. Of course, don't even attempt to bring fresh potatoes, plan on getting them in Canada, or even take frozen french fries... Chuck
[font color=green size=3][b]Tomatoes have never been a problem. Wish'in I was fish'in on Wabby
